### City of Elsa Municipal Court

The City of Elsa Municipal Court is open
**Monday through Friday, from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.**

Defendants may also submit a
via email or fax to the Court.

For additional information or assistance, please contact the Municipal Court office.

The City of Elsa Municipal Court accepts the following forms of payment

Payments may also be
**processed over the phone $3 convenience**

[Pay here](https://www.paymentservicenetwork.com/PaymentPage.aspx?acc=RT24052)
